H0.text: In Switzerland, 1978, the corpse of which entertainer was reburied in concrete after it was recovered from extortionists. Charlie Chaplin

H1.text: In Switzerland, 1978, the corpse of which entertainer was reburied in concrete after it was recovered from extortionists. Peter Sellers

H2.text: In Switzerland, 1978, the corpse of which entertainer was reburied in concrete after it was recovered from extortionists. Audrey Hepburn

H3.text: In Switzerland, 1978, the corpse of which entertainer was reburied in concrete after it was recovered from extortionists. Chaplinian

A4.text: It was re-interred in the Corsier cemetery in a reinforced concrete vault.

A5.text: The body was held for ransom in an attempt to extort money from his widow, Oona Chaplin.
